children.value: - Audio hosting with an embeddable player. Up to 3 hours of content is free.

- Allows you to display the books in your Google Books Library.
- Allows you to access any of the Goodreads data. Widgets are found on the widgets tab on your
- Embeddable calendar that you can collaborate with other people.
- Online presentations with really transitions that can zoom and rotate.
- A place for creating, presenting and sharing slide decks.
- Upload your slides as a PDF, and get an online, shareable presentation.
- Paid - An API to play videos directly to the client. Can also power live streams.
- Paid - Embeddable videos with no ads.
- Free plan has a limit of 25 videos.
- A playground of embeddable front-end code examples.
- Deploy your backend in seconds. Free tier included. Open source.
- AWS Lambda lets you run code without provisioning or managing servers. You pay only for the compute time you consume
- Create single-purpose, stand-alone functions that respond to Cloud events without the need to manage a server or runtime environment
- Call code on the server with simple HTTP, easier to set up by far than Lambda or Google's
- by Microsoft - same premise as Lambda on the Azure cloud
- by Iron.io - Run code in a multilanguage containerized environment with unlimited scale and simple pricing
- by Iron.io - IronFunctions is an open source serverless computing platform for any cloud - private, public, or hybrid.
- part of their BlueMix hosting platform, and open source, ties into their Watson AI ecosystem nicely

- Write functions as a service in the language of your choice and deploy them to a global network of data centers. All the networking, including intelligent routing and load balancing, is managed by StackPath over a private backbone.
- Vercel lets people write functions as a service in their language of choice and deploy as part of a monorepo.
- Full-stack static app hosting including serverless Functions, authentication, CDN and more
- Serverless GraphQL database. Free tier with no time limit. Easily included in Netlify apps.

- Staticman is a Node.js application that receives user-generated content and uploads it as data files to a GitHub repository. In practice, this allows you to have dynamic content (e.g. blog post comments) as part of a fully static website, as long as your site automatically deploys on every push to GitHub, as seen on GitHub Pages, Netlify and others.
- Easily embeddable comments with nested replies, multiple login methods, and email notifications.
- Embeddable comments for your site by Facebook.
- Embeddable comments with nested replies, multiple login methods, and email notifications.
- Real-time comments, SEO-optimized, stocked with social features, and beautiful on both desktop and mobile.
- Embed Reddit comments on your site. If it hasn't been posted, it will show a link to encourage the user to submit.
- Embeddable comments, forum and private messaging. A lot of functionality, but really low footprint left on your website.
- Comment system based on GitHub Issues, which can be used in the frontend without any server-side implementation.
- A comments widget built on GitHub Discussions.
- Receive emails from a form on your static website.
- Simple form processing and response retrieval via email.
- Simple form processing and response retrieval via email.
- Simple form submissions via email with optional attachments.
- Simple forms with optional file attachments, email notifications, and online submission viewing.
- Free form submission service emails you responses while keeping your email address private and is open source.
- Form endpoint service with email/Slack notifications and third party app integrations (e.g. MailChimp)
- Form backend platform for designers and developers, with email and integrations.
- Backend to handle form submissions easily and reliably, with email notifications, file uploads and GDPR-compliant data processing.
- Hassle-free HTML form endpoints for your form, powerful dashboard, reliable spam blocking, attachment uploads and Zapier integrations.
- The form backend built for developers: Zapier integrations, simple endpoint API, unlimited forms.
- Saves results into Google Sheets and can email you when there is a submission.
- Paid - View form submissions in a beautiful web interface. It has spam filtering and it integrates with webhooks such as Gmail, Trello, and Basecamp.
- Connects to other online services such at MailChimp, Salesforce, and Google Drive. It also integrates with payment Processers and includes security and analytics.
- Allows you to build any kind of form that can include complex branching logic and multiple pages.
- Form builder with payments and form management.
- Forms with A/B testing, partial submission, analytics, and integrations.
- POST and GET your data to Google Spreadsheet.
- Awesome forms that can be embedded.
- Free or Paid - Forms that you can build with a form designer, with notifications, reports, and payments.
- Forms with file upload and captcha.
- This is an interesting way for developers to get comments/questions. See
- A lightweight comments widget built on GitHub issues.
- Create form-backends and submit your HTML forms to our backend. View the entries online and connect to other services. Receive an email every time a new entry is submitted.
- A flexible server / backend for HTML forms. View your data in the realtime web interface, or use the API to get CSV and JSON output.
- Forms and email marketing (lead collection, email campaigns, and newsletters) with integrations.
- Modern forms for static sites, with native support for React.
- Turn a Google Spreadsheet into a JSON API.
- Netlify comes with built-in form handling.
- JivoSite is a professional live chat for websites that was specifically designed to increase your online sales.
- Live chat on your website. You can also see who's on your website and what they're doing.
- Live chat with integrations and custom styles.
- Lets you monitor and chat with visitors on your website.
- Live chat for your website & social networks.
- Free email marketing. You can pay to add more features.
- Email marketing with campaigns, autoresponders, and analytics.
- Email marketing with campaigns, autoresponders, and analytics.
- Email marketing with campaigns, autoresponders, and analytics.
- Free email marketing. You can pay for more subscribers.
- Sharing buttons for multiple social networks.
- A contact widget that provides an easy way for visitors to get in touch.
- You can use Google forms for surveys or for forms on your site.
- Easy to use and free surveys.
- Embed surveys anywhere on your website that comes up from the bottom right side of the screen.
- Add a shopping cart with basic html code.
- Include a few lines of code for a full online shop.
- An all-in-one solution to sell your work.
- An embeddable way to sell digital downloads & memberships
- Add a popup cart to any website - designed for static & JAMstack sites.
- Add enterprise ecommerce to your JAMstack.

- Simple full-text search in your browser.
- Full text, faceted, almost dependency free search engine in javascript
- Tiny and powerful JavaScript full-text search engine for browser and Node
- Next-Generation full text search library for Browser and Node.js
- Powerful, lightweight fuzzy-search library, with zero dependencies
- A Go program to generate JSON index of HTML files, and a JavaScript component with optional UI to search this index
- Lightweight full-text search engine developed in JavaScript for browser search and offline search based on Lunr.js
- Tiny, full-text search engine for static websites built with Rust and Wasm
- Client-side searches of JavaScript and JSON objects, ES5 compatible and does not require jQuery or any other third-party libraries
- A persistent, network resilient, full text search library for the browser and Node.js
- Tiny and blazing-fast fuzzy search in JavaScript
- Fuzzy search / filter for browser and node
- Javascript library that provides high-quality full-text search in the browser
- Search your site with a custom Google Search.
- Hosted Search API that delivers instant and relevant results from the first keystroke.
- Powerful search for your website with a few lines of JavaScript.
